About Our
Company

We are cycling enthusiasts. Fall in love with our city and tour guides obsessed with showing it.

Cost of Our
Bike Rental

We choose you to decide what best for your own needs. The price is flexible with hope you can enjoy the ride with us!

Hours ($12)

You can rent a bike for 4 hours and enjoy your riding around the city.

Day ($20)

Enough if you only need small amount of time but in daily uses

Week ($78)

There is an option to rent a bike for 1 week and learn the corners of the cxity.

Month ($299)

We provide an opportunity to rent a bike for 1 month and be a real city resident.
